page.title: 08Parental Occupations,Fearn.
page.content: We did a survey in our school asking the pupils what their parents did for a living.Most of the mothers were housewives, but there were also many other occupations which varied e.g.teachers,cooks, secretaries and shopkeepers.Many more mothers work nowadays than was the case some years ago.The fathers' occupations were mostly concerned with farming and building.There is not an awful lot of employment in our area since the oil rig fabrication yard at Nigg made a lot of people redundant.Some pupil's parents have unusual jobs-one pupil's father is a B.P. driver and another pupil's mother is a physiotherapist.There are quite a lot of retired people living in the area who have also spent their working lives here.
